reviewText: The shoes came fast. that why I like this company. everything was just right and my baby girl love them............
My husband is a fan of these and so am I. Since my son has been able to wear hard-bottom tennis shoes, we have purchased several pair and have never been disappointed.
YEP LOVE THESE! Look small but are true to size when put them on the childs foot. LOVE THEM. These are perfecto!

have always liked kswiss for myself. however, not the best for small kids. they are quite stiff and scuff so easily. and i'm not saying "gets dirty", I'm saying the leather on the front toes have totally been rubbed off after only a handful of wears. I think I'm going to have to stick to white Vans for now.
I purchased this shoe for my 2 year old daughter. It is extra cute and extra durable. Best of all, I didn't even have to leave my home to get them! I am officially an amazon junkie!

I bought these in a size 6 1/2 when my daughter was wearing size 6. I find that Reebok, Nike, & K-Swiss run a half size smaller or tend to be a little narrower than other tennis shoes. If a 6W was available, I would've ordered those instead. Also, they are nice shoes but the shoes strings are to get out and clean.
summary: Nice shoes, buy half size bigger

reviewText: These shoes.... ugh. They are so cute. And the quality is great. And they fit awesome. And they don't come off easily. I regret this purchase 0%!!!!! Love them.

I rodered this shoe in a 5.5w BIG GIRL and recieved and baby shoe the shoes looks like picture defintely and im sure you have seen it before however i was not able to return and get proper size at deal price.
My son needed shoes for his first soccer class and tennis shoes were suggested as an alternative to cleats. These seem comfortable and very durable.
Love the shoe and love K-Swiss but the shoe was too small so we had to order a larger size and rush it so he could have it in time.
The quality is still the same as I remember it. Unfortunately the sneaker does not run narrow andd the medium is just to wide. Disappointed skinny feet.
Not sure if these are real but cute. I purchased wide width and they are not wide. So beware of that. They fit my sons feet which are a medium width
summary: maybe real k swiss?? not wide more medium but cute

reviewText: Love these shoes. My son has a wide foot and they fit great! Dad has a pair and the two dress alike. Great shoe for a great price. So glad I caught them at $20.99. I see that they have gone up in price!
